## LocalUserChoices type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type LocalUserChoices = {
  username: string;
  videoEnabled: boolean;
  audioEnabled: boolean;
  videoDeviceId: string;
  audioDeviceId: string;
  e2ee: boolean;
  sharedPassphrase: string;
};
```
